title: Amish Sugar Cookies
directions: In a large bowl, beat the butter, oil and sugars. Beat in eggs until well blended. Beat in vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and cream of tartar; gradually add to creamed mixture.
Drop by small teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375Â° for 8-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove to wire racks to cool. Yield: about 5 dozen.
